1. My work on *the effect of speech rate on degraded speech comprehension* has been accepted for poster presentation at the IMPRS Conference [2022](https://www.mpi.nl/imprs-conference) to be held at MPI Psycholinguistics (Nijmegen, Netherlands) in June 01-03.

2. My work on *the role of attention on degraded speech comprehension* has been accepted for poster presentation at the APS Annual Convention [2022](https://www.psychologicalscience.org/conventions/2022-aps-annual-convention) in Chicago in May 26-29..
